product_name: Disc-O-Bed Cam-O-Bunk Cots with Organizers - Large
long_description: Bunk beds are a great way to make the most of limited space in your family camping tent. The large-size Disc-O-Bed Cam-O-Bunk cots stack to sleep two and offer organizers for books, bottles and more.
short_description: Bunk beds are a great way to make the most of limited space in your family camping tent. The large-size Disc-O-Bed Cam-O-Bunk cots stack to sleep two and offer organizers for books, bottles and more.
